issue.title: webmail.forpsi.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://webmail.forpsi.com/smart/#webmail/main/Inbox](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwebmail.forpsi.com%2Fsmart%2F%23webmail%2Fmain%2FInbox) ### Comment > After installing 7.22 I'm having issues with browsing. Majority of websites are slow, getting connection issues (webmail) and ADs are visible (perfect example is facebook). If I disable ADguard, browser is fast an no connection issues. Reinstalling the product did not fix the issue. Second machine with 7.21 is still working without any problem. ### Screenshots
